0x41,0xfc,0xe0,0x08

# CHECK:  casalb   w0, w1, [x2]

# CHECK:  casah  w0, w1, [x2]
# CHECK:  caslh   w0, w1, [x2]
# CHECK:  casalh   w0, w1, [x2]

# CHECK:  casa  x0, x1, [x2]
# CHECK:  casl   x0, x1, [x2]
# CHECK:  casal   x0, x1, [x2]
